nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Homework multiplies and tests come more often. Nights feel shorter and thoughts chase each other.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: How do I keep up without burning out?

choices.text: Set a strict study schedule and reduce fun time.
Ask teachers for help and plan study groups.
Ignore some assignments and hope for the best.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You gain control but sacrifice downtime. It works short term but feels heavy.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Teachers and friends help. Tasks become manageable and you learn better ways.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Falling behind increases anxiety. You realize avoidance costs more later.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Pressure is real, but asking for help and pacing myself keeps me growing, not breaking.
